author: Paul
content: Wow! 2 terabytes! 2 x 10^12 or 2^40 that is INCREDIBLE! 2,000,000,000,000 bytes of data or so. Yikes! I've not even filed up my 1/2 TB drive. But then again, I shoot lots of JPG.  Cool shot, there. I like it! Glad to hear that you got your computer back together, upgraded, and running again.
